text: "Hey Girl (This Is Our Time)" is a 1995 song by Australian band CDB and is the second single from their debut studio album Glide with Me. It went to number 14 in Australia and number 1 in New Zealand. ==Track listing== CD single (661108 2) # "Hey Girl (This Is Our Time)" – 3:41 # "Hey Girl (This Is Our Time)" (Sentimental Mix) – 3:53 # "Hey Girl (This Is Our Time)" (Instrumental) – 4:10 # "Break of Day" – 4:48 ==References== Category:1995 songs Category:CDB (band) songs
title: Hey Girl (This Is Our Time)
